title: Fix missing logo and make 'PBR Projects' prominent on homepage hero

requirements.text: Fix the site branding logo so it reliably displays in both the header and footer using the user-provided logo image, ensuring the referenced path `/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png` resolves correctly in production builds.

quotes: The logo is not being shown

acceptanceCriteria: Header displays the logo image on all screen sizes (no broken image icon).
Footer displays the logo image (no broken image icon).
The logo file is present at `frontend/public/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png` (or the code is updated to match the actual shipped asset path) and loads via direct navigation to that URL.

requirements.text: Update the homepage hero (top section) headline to prominently display the text "PBR Projects" in large letters, while keeping supporting tagline copy below it (English).

quotes: make sure that the 'PBR Projects' Text is written in big letters in the homepage

acceptanceCriteria: In the hero section, the largest headline text includes exactly "PBR Projects" and is visually dominant (larger than surrounding text) on mobile and desktop.
The hero section remains responsive and does not overflow or clip the headline on common breakpoints.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook entrypoints: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain single-actor; only add `backend/migration.mo` if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages or new navigation sections beyond fixing the logo and hero title prominence.
Do not change enquiry backend behavior or data model as part of this request.

required: Gold-and-charcoal "PBR Projects" logo mark on a white background (pbr-projects-logo.dim_800x800.png)
